awd_abstract_narration: 4  From: dstaudt at NOTE 6/25/93 6:44PM (896 bytes: 17 ln)  To: gclavon at nsf15  Subject: Lewis-Clark  ------------------------------- Message Contents -------------------------------  ---------------------- Original Header Lines (From NOTE) -----------------------  X-Sender: dstaudt@cise.cise.nsf.gov  ------------------------------- Message Contents -------------------------------  ABSTRACT  "Lewis-Clark State College NSFNET Connection"  Lewis-Clark State College  PI:  Scott Cowdrey  NCR-9312230      This project connects Lewis-Clark State College to NSFNET through  NorthWestNet over a 56 kbps line.  Faculty and students will benefit from  access to the resources of the Internet, including libraries and  supercomputers.  In addition, they will be able to communicate and  collaborate with colleagues at other institutions in pursuit of research  and educational projects.  The award provides partial support of the  project for two years.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
